title: A Western Doctor’s Happy Farming Life - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Ancient China   Army   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doctors   Handsome Male Lead   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Knowledge   Mpreg   Poor to Rich   Pregnancy   Transmigration   Wars
author: Luo Pao WangZi   Runaway Prince   落跑王子
description: When Song Qinghan woke up, he found that he had not only transmigrated into another world, but also… had a ball in his stomach. He thought the original owner of this body had left a total mess to him. But it turned out there was a piece of precious jade hidden in it. Looking at the six-pack abs of Wu Dahu, he rubbed his hands with great excitement. Farming, your job! Hunting, your job! Giving birth, ahem, you worked hard! But surgery… leave it to me!>
